resources.string:
Chandigarh, The capital of PUNJAB and HARYANA and also known as the "THE CITY BEAUTIFUL" and entirely designed by French architect "Le Corbusier". 
It's one of the greenest cities in India with parks, open spaces, perfect design, clean surroundings, gardens, and lakes, etc. that make it an ideal place to dwell and travel. 

 The Open Hand Monument is a symbolic structure designed by the architect Le Corbusier. It is the emblem and symbol of the Government of Chandigarh and symbolizes "the hand to give and the hand to take; peace and prosperity, and the unity of mankind"
